name: Soul Searcher (ashtynkelley)
description:
Hi! If you've come across this, that means you probably know me in real life! This is the game I made for my game design class in my last semester of college. It's nothing much - just two short levels - but I wanted to be able to share my work with anyone who wanted to see it! Thanks for checking it out and I hope you enjoy it, even if it's just a silly little skeleton platformer. I'm not a game designer, so just keep that in mind. :)

CONTROLS: 

Move: W, A, S, D 

Jump: Space Bar

Shoot: Left Mouse Button

Teleport: T
